project1.title: The Galen, HQ of Ascendas
project1.spec: 400 M² / Pièces 8 / 4 Chambres / magasins / bus / terrace / garage / piscine / lake
project1.imagebrief: Galen chiller plant room- uncluttered, minimization of sharp bends, long straight lines where possible. Notice the pumps are positioned to optimize pipe layout, not the other way around.
highlights: Chiller plant efficiency of 0.563kW/RT, one of the most energy-efficient chiller plants in Singapore
Energy saving of 58%, translating to S$1.1mil a year saving in utilities cost and life cycle cost
Saving of more than S$16mil over 20 years
CO2 emission reduced by 2,700 metric tonnes per year
Galen chiller plant room - uncluttered, minimisation of sharp bends, long straight lines where possible
Pumps positioned to optimise pipe layout, not the other way round

project2.title: Grand Hyatt In Singapore
project2.spec: 400 M² / Pièces 8 / 4 Chambres / magasins / bus / terrace / garage / piscine / lake
highlights: Achieved savings of over S$1,000,000 pa
Payback period of 2 years and 5 months
project2.description: The project included supply, install, consultancy, and management of air-conditioning equipment valued at S$3,200,000. Taking Singapore tax incentives into consideration, the net investment reduced to S$2,400,000. Energy savings achieved close to S$1,000,000 per annum. With accelerated depreciation allowance and tax incentive, this translates to a payback period of 2 years and 5 months or a return on investment of 42%.

project4.title: Republic Plaza
project4.spec: 400 M² / Pièces 8 / 4 Chambres / magasins / bus / terrace / garage / piscine / lake
project4.subtitle: Infrastructure Enhancements At Republic Plaza To Result In Energy Savings Of S$870,000 Annually
project4.author: Trane High Performance Buildings December 27, 2012
project4.description: Infrastructure Upgrades At The Republic Plaza Building, One Of Singapore's Tallest Skyscrapers, Have Made It One Of The Most Efficient Buildings In Singapore. The Anticipated Energy Savings Are Estimated At Four Million Kilowatt-Hour Of Energy, Or An Annual Savings Of S$870,000. This Is Equivalent To Powering 1,300 Four-Room Apartments Annually. The 66-Story, 280-Meter High Republic Plaza Is A Grade A Office Building Located At Raffles Place In The Heart Of Singapore's Central Business District. Developer And Building Owner City Developments Limited (CDL) Completed The Improvements To Enhance The Building's Energy Efficiency And To Provide A More Comfortable And Productive Working Environment For Building Tenants. CDL Has A Strong Commitment To Sustainability Through Its Property Portfolio. Annual Electricity Savings From CDL Sustainable Buildings Are Estimated At $$19.7 Million For The 37 Buildings Which Received Green Mark Certification Between 2008 And 2011. The High Performance Buildings Journey High Performance Buildings Take A Whole-Building Approach To Performance While Creating Spaces That Are Reliable, Safe, Healthy, Comfortable And Efficient. Trane, A Leading Global Provider Of Indoor Comfort Systems And Solutions And A Brand Of Ingersoll Rand, Worked Closely With CDL Leaders For A Plan To Maximize The Efficiency Of Republic Plaza. High Performance Buildings Meet Specific Standards For Energy And Water Consumption, System Reliability And Uptime, Environmental Compliance And Occupant Comfort. All Standards Are Set To Deliver Established Outcomes That Help Building Owners And Occupants Achieve Their Business Missions.
